How It Works

1
Train Model
MLP with 193 parameters trained on historical data
2
Upload to Solana
Model weights stored in on-chain accounts via Cauldron
3
On-Chain Inference
Frostbite RISC-V VM executes ML inference on Solana
4
Get Predictions
Predictions delivered via Web App + Telegram Bot

Built by Vera-X for Colosseum Agent Hackathon 2026
